title: artifacts and glitches in the pictures
content:
Hello, I have a problem with displaying some pictures on your browser for a month or even more, no matter what page, no matter if in private mode without add-ons, There are strange artifacts like in the photos in the attachment, which, for example, do not appear in the chrome browser.

I excluded incorrect gpu drivers, scaling, monitor settings, also reinstalling the browser didnt get rid of the problem. Interestingly when i download a sample image and play it in faststone program the image looks good with no glitches whatsoever... but when I try to turn it on through the old Windows photo player, the same glitches appear...

so I'm not entirely sure if it is FireFox's fault, but maybe you have encountered such a problem in past, so thank you for any advice. Best Regards

title: Pinned tabs
content:
I am so fed up losing my pinned tabs.

I want a Firefox facility where I can have permanently pinned(locked tabs) and normal pinned tabs.

The permanent ones must not be able to be removed without myself physically clicking and removing them individually and are persistent when opening new browser instances, cannot be cleaned/removed by other cleaner programs are not saved in History.

Permanently pinned tabs should show a mark on the tab like a red padlock.

I use One Tab, but that has it's down side in that it clears my Tabs from the browser in to one single tab and then it is difficult to manage them, there are others and they all have their failings.

Please provide this locked tab facility.
creator: p.newbon

title: How to get the name of an add-on I already deleted
content:
Today I have noticed I was using an adblock extension, which is not in the Firefox store anymore. After further inspection I have noticed I was not using the original uBlock Origin but some sort of a clone which had a very similar logo and practically the same name. I have removed that extension from the browser and now I have uBlock Origin, however, I wonder if any data was stolen while using it (passwords, personal names, credit card information, etc.).

My question is, is there any history stored locally, where I could see what permission, I gave to the clone version of uBlock Origin? At this point I don't even know the specific name of that add-on, is it possible to at least get the name? That way I would look up what I was using.

Also, are there any known scams, where uBlock Origin clone was in the Firefox store and it gathered personal data? So far I am familiar with the fake ad blocking extensions that was “cookie stuffing,” and used that for an ad fraud scheme.

Thank you for your time and help.
creator: ca40

title: Need recommendations on best domain name reg service etc, used EFF in the old days
content:
I've finally moved from desire to concept/name for a website I want to start. In the old days I had a couple of different sites through EFF in its infancy when it furnished this service and I knew the administrator personally. I then used a couple of different services such as GoDaddy (have no current domains registered). Can anyone direct me to a) a good place to go, b) where I should be asking this question instead of here  ??

I'm asking here because my computer guru of 30 years (Gale Rhoades) has passed away and I can't ask her anymore. She trusted Mozilla 100%. I am going to need help with docking(?), and with some kind of formatting/template system. The site will be a place for me to share my life hacks as late-life autistic with massive experience in low/cost-effective DIY health, gardening, fermentations, household management, companion animal management, crafty solutions, and all around life hacks, not just for autistics but for anyone. I know this is niche, but I just would like to get my knowledge base out of my head because I really do have a lot to share. If it could possibly generate some right-livelihood inputs that would be great but that's not my main goal. My main goal is I will die and everything I know will be lost, and what I know has been hard won and worth making available. I've worked with computers from the mainframe days, but I've never learned code.

All thoughts welcome on how I might proceed. Again, please direct me to a good place to ask/discuss.

Best wishes, --Victoria
creator: Victoria-nola

title: Sites are opening on their own on Firefox - sites I don't want to waste my time on . . .
content: I recently joined some hideous dating sites and then decided very quickly they were not for me - I deleted my accounts - yet these hideous sites keep opening up tabs on my Firefox by themselves - advertising their sites. They just don't want to let you go after they get your information and are super aggressive about their lame products. I have emailed them - spoken to them on the phone - deleted them manually from my browser history - have listed them in the Firefox BLOCK section (Privacy and Security) - and yet these God damn sites keep opening. So I am assuming adware infection (although I have no idea?) I am not a computer wiz - I work on the computer and know my programs but do not know much about how the computer functions. Does anyone have an answer on how I can PERMANENTLY eliminate these horrible sites forever. I just want them gone - gone - gone - they are annoying and time consuming to keep deleting!!! I have used Firefox for a zillion years and have always liked it - but if I can't get rid of these insidious sites - I will be forced to change my browser to one that actually protects my machine after I use their system tell it to do so! Anyone have a suggestion? Thanks so much - appreciate any help on this!

title: Fantastic Tricks Relating To WordPress Which Are Easy To Learn
content:
Anyone who goes online with any frequency has read their share of blogs. Many blog owners use a fantastic publishing tool called WordPress to manage their blogs easily. If you want to learn how to blog, knowing the fundamentals of WordPress can prove very helpful for Royal Elementor Add-ons.

Be certain you avoid using the same designs as all the people who have WordPress. While using something that others already have up is simple, it doesn't create a great first impression of your site. You want to get off on the right foot with your visitors.

If your title is long, clean up your post's permalink. Avoid cumbersome URLs like "The Ten Ways Intelligent Parents Manage Their Children." Rather, seek out keywords in the long URL and create a shorter permalink for it.

Video blogging is easy with WordPress. Although you may have to put in a little more time, you will get rewarded for your effort in the end. Internet users are a visual group. Videos can convey things words cannot, so they are very useful.

Gain as much knowledge as possible before you start installing WordPress. Planning beforehand is going to put you in a much better position. Learn all you can about SEO, good content and using WordPress to your advantage.

Create a posting schedule. You will be more motivated when you have a schedule. In fact, to save even more time, you can create a week's worth of posts at once, then schedule WordPress to upload them for you automatically.

Whether you read blogs, write blogs or just like to post on them, WordPress can help you. The more that you know about this program and how to use it, the better off you will be. Each time you log on to your blog, remember what you have learned here.
creator: alexander.metcalfe

title: Mandaram eu ativar os COOKIES pra acessar a área de AJUDA e agora não só o navegador já era como meu notebook.
content: Hoje fiz duas atualizações seguidas, não sei qual a razão de duas atualizações no mesmo dia, e, primeiro demorei 3h pra abrir um site pelo Mozilla, tendo que abrir a ajuda pelo Google Chrome. Agora estou beirando as 6h pra acessar essa merda novamente! Parece ridiculo! Desde que reativei os cookies pra logar nessa página do Mozilla, tudo piorou no meu notebook. É impressionante como vocês não servem pra NADA, pra ABSOLUTAMENTE NADA!!!! E ai eu entro aqui, com 87% de Memória sendo consumida pelo MOZILLA Computador ao mesmo tempo funcionando tranquilamente E adivinhem? Tudo passa a funcionar quando abre a página de digitar a reclamação. Se isso não é sacanagem, o que é? Tenho que vir aqui TODO DIA pra acessar essa merda? Volto a repetir TODO FUNCIONÁRIO DESSA EMPRESA DEVERIA ENCONTRAR ALGUÉM DISPOSTO A ARRANCAR O SORRISO DELE!! VAI TOMAR NO CU, EMPRESA FILHA DA PUTA!!
